title: Thought I Would Try
author: Mur
citation: Mur. "Thought I Would Try: experience with Damiana (ID 47364)". Erowid.org. Apr 21, 2006. erowid.org/exp/47364
report:
I decided to to try smoking some damiana leaves to attain a buzz( I have not been able to smoke ganja in over a year due to random urine analysis.) So I purchased some from a local store and excitedly went home to try it out.

I immediatly packed a bowl and smoked it right down, nothing! I waited ten min and smoked some more, nothing! At this point I figured I would eat( a couple grams, maybe three) some as this had worked for others, nothing! Until the next morning when I had quite an experience in the bathroom.
